page.title: 07Reply From The Local MP
page.content: I was interested to hear that your class is taking part in the BBC Domesday Project and wish you every success. To answer your questions: 1. I have been the Member of Parliament for Poole since May 1979. 2. One great change will take place in Poole if the exploration for oil in Poole Harbour is successful. We shall then have a large oilfield in the harbour area. The country needs the oil and it will create more jobs in this area, but we must make sure that no damage is done either to the local environment or to the traditional industries, such as fishing, boating and water sports. B.P. now have permission to drill four exploratory wells on Furzey Island, and they have promised to make the house and gardens on the island available for local use.
